hope

pq

ELT0005098

FEDERAL TRADE COMMISSION
‘WASHINGTON. D.C. 20580 way 21 1809

eee Indy Gee

Clarence Gook Little,

See Dy

Scientific Director,

The Councll for Tobacco
Research = U.S.A,

633 Third Avenue,

New York, N. ¥. 10017

Dear Mr, Littles

‘The Commission has initiated a Trade Regulation Rule
proceeding relating to the advertising of cigarettes. The
Proposed Rule would require the clear and prominent dis-
closure in cigarette advertising that cigarette smoking is
dangerous to health and may cause death from cancer, coronary
heart disease, chronic bronchitis, pulmonary emphysema, and
other disease:

 

 

 

   

Full details concerning these proceedings are contained _
in the News Release and Notice of Rulemaking Proceeding
‘transmitted herewith.

Your participation in these proceedings either by

written submission filed with the undersigned by n late~

than June 20, 1969 and/or by an actual appearance at public
rings to Commence on July 1, 1969 (with written copies or

jummaries of your oral statement to be filed with the

Secretary by no later than June 20, 1969) is cordially invited.

In the event you wish to testify at the hearings, please

advise us of the time you estimate will be necessary to deliver

your statement, In addition, in delivering your oral statement

you may wish to summarize or stresa the salient features

rather than restating your entire atatement, which will have

‘been made a part of the public record.

 

 

   

   

Should you or any mesber of your staff require any
further information, I will be happy to make myself available,

It ds regretted that a form letter has been used. The
need for tinsly notice left no alternative,

Gerald T, McDonough,
Acting Chief, Division of
Enclosures. ‘Trade Regulation Rules.

summary: Cigarette smoking is dangerous to health and may cause death from cancer, coronaryheart disease, chronic bronchitis, pulmonary emphysema, and other disease. The proposed Rule would require the clear and prominent dis-phthalclosure in cigarette advertising that cigarette smoking. is harmful tohealth.
